info.gridworld.actor
类 Jumper

java.lang.Object
  info.gridworld.actor.Actor
      info.gridworld.actor.Jumper

public class Jumper
extends Actor

A Jumper is an actor that can move and turn. It drops flowers as it moves.
The implementation of this class is testable on the AP CS A and AB exams.

构造方法摘要
Jumper()
          Constructs a red Jumper.
Jumper(java.awt.Color JumperColor)
          Constructs a Jumper of a given color.
 
方法摘要
 void act()
          Moves if it can move, turns otherwise.
 boolean canMove()
          Tests whether this Jumper can move forward into a location that is empty or contains a flower.
 void move()
          Moves the Jumper forward, putting a flower into the location it previously occupied.
 void turn()
          Turns the Jumper 45 degrees to the right without changing its location.
 
从类 info.gridworld.actor.Actor 继承的方法
getColor, getDirection, getGrid, getLocation, moveTo, putSelfInGrid, removeSelfFromGrid, setColor, setDirection, toString
 
从类 java.lang.Object 继承的方法
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait
 

构造方法详细信息

Jumper

public Jumper()
Constructs a red Jumper.

Jumper

public Jumper(java.awt.Color JumperColor)
Constructs a Jumper of a given color.

参数：
JumperColor - the color for this Jumper
方法详细信息

act

public void act()
Moves if it can move, turns otherwise.

覆盖：
类 Actor 中的 act

turn

public void turn()
Turns the Jumper 45 degrees to the right without changing its location.

move

public void move()
Moves the Jumper forward, putting a flower into the location it previously occupied.

canMove

public boolean canMove()
Tests whether this Jumper can move forward into a location that is empty or contains a flower.

返回：
true if this Jumper can move.
